title: HearthCrawler Universal Patcher [arMa]
description:
INFORMATION: As i got tired of continously cracking this application over and over, i bet you also got tired waiting for a crack, right? So thats why i created this.
This patch may work for future releases of HearthCrawler as well

INSTRUCTIONS:
1) Download the latest release from the official site
2) Place HearthPatcher.exe in the same dir as HearthCrawler.exe
3) Run it.
4) Click "Patch"
5) Open HearthCawler.exe

Easy as that! Have fun:)
